prompts: Create a blue and pink Pokemon that specializes in poison and fighting techniques.
Show me a Pokemon with a bipedal stance and unique color patterns, perfect for battling.
Imagine a creature with vibrant colors that thrives in forest habitats and loves to spar.
Design a Pokemon that looks tough and agile, with strong arms and an adventurous spirit.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a warrior, combining fighting and poison attributes.
Make a character that embodies both elegance and strength, with a striking color palette.
Give me a Pokemon that is rare, has a playful personality, and enjoys urban environments.
